document_data.name: Wanderer's Rest
document_data.source: [[City of Delights| City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wanderer's Rest''' was a boarding house located in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: The Wanderer's Rest could be found in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of the City of Delights.
document_data.Inhabitants: The large boarding house could accommodate up to 20 guests at once. It was owned and operated by [[Fatima Kossi]].
document_data.Activities: Guests of the Wanderer's Rest could expect to pay 1 [[dirham]] per night. However, Fatima's kindheartedness meant that she often let true pilgrim's stay for free.
